long_description: The SRAM PC1051 10-speed chain with PowerLock(R) is recommended for use with SRAM Red, SRAM Force, SRAM Rival, SRAM Apex and industry standard 10-speed systems. PowerLock connecting link is a tool-free, sure and consistent way to connect the chain. HollowPin(TM) construction provides smooth, precise shifting and weight savings. While no special tools are required for install, the especially tight tolerances of 10-speed drivetrains mandate that each PowerLock is good for a 1-time application only.
short_description: The SRAM PC1051 10-speed chain with PowerLock(R) is recommended for use with SRAM Red, SRAM Force, SRAM Rival, SRAM Apex and industry standard 10-speed systems.
